net.joala.dns
Class NameStore

java.lang.Object
  net.joala.dns.NameStore

@ThreadSafe
public final class NameStore
extends Object

This store is responsible for overriding calls for resolving host names. It allows you to manually add and remove known hosts during your tests.

Since:
10/5/12

Method Detail

nameStore

@Nonnull
public static NameStore nameStore()

Get singleton instance of name store.

Returns:
name store instance

register

public void register(@Nonnull
                     String name,
                     @Nonnull
                     InetAddress... addresses)

Register name with the given addresses. If name is already registered for some inet addresses the given addresses will be added to the known ones.

Parameters:
name - host name
addresses - list of addresses to register for name

register

public void register(@Nonnull
                     String name,
                     @Nonnull
                     String... addresses)

Register name with the given addresses. If name is already registered for some inet addresses the given addresses will be added to the known ones.

Parameters:
name - host name
addresses - list of addresses to register for name

unregister

public void unregister(@Nonnull
                       String name)

Unregister name with all its addresses. Requires DNS cache to be disabled.

Parameters:
name - host name

clear

public void clear()
Clear the complete name store. Recommended before and after running the tests in order to prevent that tests influence each other.

toString

public String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class Object
